name: Momentum (itch) (wevwyrm, ARIA VEIL, shadowlerone)
description:
Made for GameBling 2.0 in 24h!

Betting got a little too serious when you traded your life for money.  Welcome to Momentum, a lil roulette inspired tower defense game...

Stop the marbles from reaching your heart by placing betting chips around the track! Press the play button to let them on the track when you're ready, but be wary... for cash and life are one in the same...

Programming by shadowlerone

Art by wevwyrm (Rev)

Music by ARIA VEIL and shadowlerone
